files.content: export class Animal { constructor(public name: string) { } move(meters: number) { console.log(this.name + ' moved ' + meters + 'm.'); } }
import { Animal } from './Animal'; export class Snake extends Animal { move() { console.log('Slithering...'); super.move(5); } }
import { Animal } from './Animal'; export class Horse extends Animal { move() { console.log('Galloping...'); super.move(45); } }
